title: "What is the relationship between judgment and perception in Giuliano Kremmerz's magic teachings?"
first_phrase: In the last 200 tokens of this text, the author discusses the teachings of Giuliano Kremmerz and the tools necessary for initiatory work towards the liberation of one's faculties. The author highlights the importance of conscious neutrality and balance in the pursuit of hermetic knowledge. The text also includes excerpts from various works of Kremmerz, which have been reorganized to shed light on specific aspects of his teachings.

last_phrase: In conclusion, to develop hermetic intelligence, one must strive for complete purity, which is an unwavering conscious neutrality. To achieve this, it is crucial to maintain mental and physical equilibrium, live a moderate lifestyle, detach from negative influences, and integrate spiritual and bodily powers consistently. One must use and abstain from everything with willfulness, fast when ill, and strive for a sober existence.
